While we did catch some notable chances to save on Samsung’s latest wearable when bundled up with the new foldable smartphones at launch, deals have largely been rare and slight since then. With Prime Day in full swing, however, we are getting new Amazon all-time low pricing starting at $314.99 shipped.

Amos Zeeberg / New York Times:

items.title: Suunto Sues Garmin For Five Different Patent Infringements
items.summary:
Little over a week ago, Strava filed a lawsuit against its long-running competitor Garmin over its patented segments and heatmaps features. Now, with Garmin still reeling from the legal trouble, Finnish brand Suunto is tagging in, suing the company alongside Strava. Instead of just two patents, Suunto accuses Garmin of infringing five different patents. These […]

items.title: SoftBank Group agrees to acquire ABB's robotics business, which generated $2.3B in sales in 2024, for $5.4B, in a deal expected to close in mid-to-late 2026 (John Revill/Reuters)
items.summary:
John Revill / Reuters:
SoftBank Group agrees to acquire ABB's robotics business, which generated $2.3B in sales in 2024, for $5.4B, in a deal expected to close in mid-to-late 2026  —  SoftBank Group (9984.T) said on Wednesday it has agreed to buy the robotics business of Swiss engineering group ABB (ABBN.S) in a $5.4 billion deal.
